title: Have login problems
body: I click on league to play and it says "We have restored this installation to an older version of league of legends. Now we'll try to patch it up to the latest version." Then it say to click the "Okay" button when i do it says "There was a problem patching League of Legends. We'll restore a backup version and try updating again after you restart the patcher." Finally I click restart and the client closes and comes back on to say the same thing again. Any help?

replies.body: Let me know if you're still having this strange patcher loop problem, as I've been getting word that the devs were able to figure out and solve what happened. If you are, go ahead and hit up our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well.
